rows.label: qev030903_MSG0001
rows.name:
All are gone? Good. Now we wait for great beast.
Then we offer up my father's body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0002
rows.name: Once auravis arrives, we lay Auld Belgazus to rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0003
rows.name: It comes! My father's spirit calls it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0004
rows.name:
Auld Belgazus, your life spirit was watched over by
great belgazus. Now be with auravis in death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0005
rows.name:
Become its flesh. Become its blood.
Then fly across Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0006
rows.name: Prone return souls of departed to beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0007
rows.name:
Then soul and beast watch over new lives born
into clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0008
rows.name: Grandfather will be pleased to have joined noble beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0009
rows.name: *sniff* Farewell, Grandfather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0010
rows.name: Wh-what is that? Everyone, look! Something comes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0011
rows.name: Garuda jacul? Why is such thing here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0012
rows.name: It comes closer! Get back! Scatter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0014
rows.name:
Interruptions aside, rite is complete.
My father was claimed by giant. He will be pleased.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0015
rows.name:
...Yes? What is it? You seem lost.
Do our ways confuse you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev030903_SEL0051
rows.name: Express doubts about Prone funeral rites.

rows.label: qev030903_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev030903_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that such things seem natural to you.

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0016
rows.name:
We live with beasts. Die with beasts. It is natural.
Perhaps it is only strange to Earth aliens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0017
rows.name: It is simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0018
rows.name:
Beasts sustain us in our lives.
In death, we become meat to show thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0019
rows.name: You are wise Earth alien! Most do not understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0020
rows.name: Other races call us barbarians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0021
rows.name: ...Oh! This means next child will inherit name Jacul![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030903_MSG0022
rows.name:
You should be one to tell Bazis of this.
He will weep tears of joy.[ST:wait ]
